for i in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    n = int(raw_input())
    num_seven = n%7
    if num_seven%4 == 0:
        print n-num_seven
    else:
        num_seven = 4
        while num_seven <= n and (num_seven%4 or (n - num_seven)%7):
            num_seven += 4
        print n-num_seven if num_seven%4 == 0 and (n - num_seven)%7 == 0 and num_seven <= n else -1
